Class OrderFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • Logic.OrderFacade

  • public class OrderFacade
extends Object
    Singleton logic facade for handling orders from database to presentation.
    Author:
    Runi

      • createOrder

        public Order createOrder(int length,
                         int width,
                         int height,
                         int userID)
                  throws OrderException
        Creates an order from desired parameters, adds it to database. If successful, returns order with updated ID (AUTO_INCREMENT) & status_sent (Default: False/0) returned from database.
        Parameters:
        length - desired length in DOTS (int)
        width - desired with in DOTS (int)
        height - desired height in BLOCKS (int)
        userID -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        OrderException - custom exception to handle later
        See Also:
        OrderMapper

        Throws:

      • updateOrderStatus

        public boolean updateOrderStatus(int order_id,
                                 Boolean status)
                          throws OrderException
        Updates the status of the order in question
        Parameters:
        order_id - specific order ID
        status - new desired status of the order
        Returns:
        returns true if update went correctly, false if not
        Throws:
        OrderException - custom exception to handle later
